Response body.description: A unique identifier for the user generated by the server

URL path parameters.description: The unique identifier of the user to retrieve

Request body.description: The name of the user (must be unique)

Error 4xx.description: Some of the user's properties are invalid

examples.title: 422 Unprocessable Entity

title: List existing users
name: RetrieveUsers
description: Retrieves a paginated list of users with their respective scores.

examples.title: 200 OK
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
    Content-Type: application/json
    Link: <https://comem-archioweb-2019-2020-g.herokuapp.com/api/users?page=1&pageSize=50>; rel="first prev"

   [
  {
      "_id": "5dc6b5f84080dc5e74951c66",
      "username": "meme",
      "created_at": "2019-11-09T14:46:20.978Z",
      "totalScore": 120,
      "maxScore": 10,
      "averageScore": 10
  },
  {
      "_id": "5dc43646260fc7305c7ae3fd",
      "username": "pauline",
      "created_at": "2019-11-09T14:46:20.979Z",
      "totalScore": 48,
      "maxScore": 24,
      "averageScore": 24
  }
]

Response headers.description: Links to the first, previous, next and last pages of the collection (if applicable)

Request body.description: The name of the user (must be unique)

URL query parameters.description:
Embed linked resources in the response body:

  • "totalScore" for the guesses of the user
The number of elements to retrieve in one page (defaults to 100)
